title: The Port mob
creator_credit: Edwin Whiting, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Edwin Whiting speaks fondly of his time when he and his mates had the run of Port Melbourne in the 1930s. They spent most of their spare time together, but World War II changed everything.
creator_credit_for_label: Edwin Whiting, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
